name: Goblin of Greed

name: Reflect Bounder

name: A Deal with Dark Ruler

(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
If a Level 8 or higher monster under your control was sent to the Graveyard this turn: Special Summon 1 "Berserk Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

name: Metallizing Parasite - Lunatite
desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to a face-up monster on your side of the field as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, that monster will be unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards controlled by your opponent. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the monster that this card is equipped to is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)
setcode: Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: D.D. Warrior Lady
desc: After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that monster, also banish this card.

name: Infernalqueen Archfiend
desc: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, during each Standby Phase, increase the ATK of 1 Archfiend Monster Card by 1000 points until the End Phase.
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Maju Garzett
desc: The ATK of this card becomes equal to the combined original ATK of the 2 monsters you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.

name: Shadowknight Archfiend
desc: The controller of this card pays 900 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent is halved.

desc: Activate by paying 1000 Life Points. The effects of all face-up monsters on the field are negated while those monsters are face-up on the field (but their effects can still be activated).
setcode: Dark Crisis,Gold Series,Battle Pack: Epic Dawn,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Battle Pack: Epic Dawn,Dark Crisis,Duel Terminal 3,Turbo Pack: Booster Eight,

name: Dice Re-Roll
desc: One time, during the rest of this turn, if either player(s) rolls a die (or dice), you can have the player(s) re-roll. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
setcode: Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack,Dark Crisis,

name: Arsenal Summoner
desc: FLIP: Add 1 "Guardian" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Celtic Guardian", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #2", "Guardian of the Labyrinth", or "The Reliable Guardian".
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Berserk Dragon
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "A Deal with Dark Ruler" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. During each of your End Phases, this card loses 500 ATK.
setcode: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack,Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
desc: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Shinato's Ark". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Level equal 8 or more from the field or your hand. When this card destroys a Defense Position monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.
setcode: Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: D.D. Trainer
desc: A poor goblin that was sucked into a different dimension. However, he's doing his best with his new destiny.
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Blast Held by a Tribute
desc: When an opponent's monster that was Tribute Summoned declares an attack: Destroy as many face-up Attack Position monsters they control as possible, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
setcode: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Destiny Masters,Duelist Pack: Rivals of the Pharaoh,Duel Terminal 5b,Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: Little-Winguard
desc: Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can change the battle position of this card.
setcode: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants,Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack,Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants,Starter Deck: Jaden Yuki,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Staunch Defender
desc: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. During this turn, your opponent can only designate the selected monster as an attack target and your opponent must attack the selected monster with all face-up monsters.
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Morale Boost
desc: Each time a player equips an Equip Spell Card, increase the Life Points of the controller of that Equip Spell Card by 1000 points. Each time an Equip Spell Card is removed from the field, the controller of that Equip Spell Card takes 1000 points of damage.
setcode: Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: Battle-Scarred
desc: Select 1 Archfiend monster on your side of the field to activate this card. Your opponent also pays the same Life Points that you pay for the selected monster during the Standby Phase. If this card is removed from the field, destroy the selected monster. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.
setcode: Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: Pandemonium
desc: Neither player has to pay Life Points during the Standby Phase for "Archfiend" monsters. Each time a player's "Archfiend" monster(s) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, except by battle, that player can add 1 "Archfiend" monster from their Deck to their hand with a lower Level than the destroyed card.
setcode: Gold Series,Dark Crisis,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,

name: Rod of the Mind's Eye
desc: If a monster equipped with this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, the damage becomes 1000 points.
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Final Countdown
desc: Pay 2000 Life Points. After 20 turns have passed (counting the turn you activate this card as the 1st turn), you win the Duel.
setcode: Champion Pack: Game One,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Dark Crisis,

name: Rod of Silence - Kay'est
desc: The equipped monster gains 500 DEF. Negate other Spell effects that target the equipped monster, and if you do, destroy that Spell Card.
setcode: Dark Revelation Volume 1,Dark Crisis,Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack,Dark Crisis,

name: Shooting Star Bow - Ceal
desc: The equipped monster loses 1000 ATK, but it can attack your opponent directly.

name: Contract with the Dark Master
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Dark Master - Zorc". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.
setcode: Dark Crisis,Millennium Pack,Dark Revelation Volume 1,Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack,Dark Crisis,

name: Dark Master - Zorc
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Contract with the Dark Master". Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die, then destroy all monsters your opponent controls if you roll 1 or 2, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls if you roll 3, 4 or 5, or destroy all monsters you control if you roll 6.
